thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 276 2
thread.title: The Gavitron
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 The Gavitron

author: The Gavitron
title: The Gavitron
text:
I love shopping with BangGood. I always find things that I didn't know I was looking for, until I find it there. I love when I find a new category that wasn't there before, meaning even more good deals. They sell all the things I want, electronics, gadgets, etc.
Also, their customer support is excellent, their staff have always left me statisfied.
